title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Thursday, 10 March 2016 - BBC News
summary: essex police detectives say the shooting of notorious criminal john `` goldfinger '' palmer `` bears all the hallmarks of a professional hit '' .
the force confirms two officers were disciplined for failing to spot he had been shot .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on friday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: updates for essex live have finished for today - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back tomorrow with the latest news for the county .
have a great evening .

documents.title: weather : chance of frost
text: a prolonged dry spell of weather on the way , making it feel a little milder .
it will stay dry this evening and overnight , with the chance of a frost and some mist and fog patches developing towards the end of the night .
lows of -1c ( 30f )
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: new boss at growing airport as executives switch roles
text: stansted airport has a new boss to replace andrew harrison , who is moving to a new post within the parent company , manchester airports group ( mag ) .
andrew cowan , currently chief strategy officer at mag , has been appointed chief executive of the north essex airport and is swapping his role with mr harrison who will move to manchester .
during the past three years , £ 80m has been spent on the terminal and the airport has attracted five million more passengers , a spokesman said .
author: Patrick Byrne
BBC News

documents.title: headlines : officers disciplined over john palmer mistake elderly woman manhandled by a burglar near southend
text: here are your top stories this evening :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: elderly woman woke in night to find burglar in bedroom
text: an 85-year-old woman has been left `` very distressed '' after waking up in the middle of the night to find a burglar in her bedroom .

he put his hand over her mouth to stop her calling out and stole a laptop , a black handbag containing a small amount of cash and bank cards , and a jewellery box from her property in little wakering in the early hours of this morning , police said .
the suspect is described as white , aged about 18 to 20 , 5ft 6ins tall and of slim build .
author: Patrick Byrne
BBC News

documents.title: goldfinger murder : john palmer 's criminal friends
text: john palmer , who is said to have been murdered by a professional hitman , had several criminal friends .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live

documents.title: brown wants 'clean-sheet mentality '
text: southend united boss phil brown has bemoaned the lack of `` a clean-sheet mentality '' at southend united this season .
the shrimpers , who sit 10th in league one , have failed to keep a clean sheet in their last six league fixtures .
`` last year , i think i said the league was a 1-0 kind of league and this year it 's more like 2-1 , '' brown told bbc essex .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: goldfinger murder : officers did not check criminal history
text: the police officers called to the scene when john `` goldfinger '' palmer was shot at his home in south weald did not check his criminal history or realise his high profile , it has emerged .

an essex police spokesman said the pair `` did not call an inspector to the scene to confirm their assessment or check mr palmer 's antecedents on the police national computer '' when called to the property last june .
`` given the full circumstances of the information they were presented with at the time it was judged that this did not amount to gross misconduct , '' the spokesman added .

documents.title: goldfinger murder : police actions 'did not amount to gross misconduct '
text: essex police has confirmed two officers who were first on the scene when john `` goldfinger '' palmer was killed did not fully comply with the force 's policy on dealing with sudden deaths .
mr palmer , a 65-year-old conman , was found at his home in south weald , essex , in june .
officers and paramedics initially thought he had died from natural causes , having recently had chest surgery , and so did not carry out a full examination of the body .
essex police said the officers ' actions did not amount to gross misconduct .

documents.title: goldfinger murder : officers disciplined after failing to spot shooting
text: two police officers who were first on the scene when notorious criminal john `` goldfinger '' palmer was killed have been disciplined for failing to spot he had been shot .
more to follow .

documents.title: travel : problems continue on the m25
text: a lane is still closed on the clockwise m25 and there are also delays on the anticlockwise side between junction 26 for waltham abbey and junction 27 for the m11 after a lorry overturned and spilled sand on the carriageway earlier .
follow the latest updates here .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: labrador dies after being injured on a120 when it escaped from home with three other dogs in stisted
text: a labrador has died after being injured on the a120 when it escaped from home with three other dogs .

documents.title: goldfinger murder : palmer was worth £ 300m
text: john palmer , whose murder will appear on crimewatch this evening , was worth an estimated £ 300m at one time , making him 105th on the sunday times rich list .
he owned a mansion , a jet , two helicopters , a classic car collection and a yacht called the brave goose of essex .
he also bought a chateau with its own golf course in normandy , which has been abandoned and now lies in a state of disrepair .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : becoming brighter but staying chilly
text: it will be brighter through the afternoon with sunny spells developing in places but will feel chilly in northeasterly winds .
maximum temperature : 10 c ( 50f )
evening outlook : dry with clear periods allowing temperatures to fall with patches of frost or fog likely by dawn .
check the forecast here for your part of essex .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: ambulance service boss weathering 'perfect storm '
text: the head of the ambulance service which covers essex has told mps the trust is facing a `` perfect storm '' but was making progress .
robert morton , head of the east of england ambulance service , said it was struggling to cope with an increase in call-outs , staff shortages and hospital delays .
he outlined some of the operational changes to deal with growing problems he is making during a private meeting at westminster with east anglian mps who felt mr morton was making progress .
author: Andrew Sinclair
BBC Look East political correspondent

documents.title: headlines : tv appeal to feature notorious essex criminal murder ambulance service facing 'perfect storm '
text: here are the top stories we 've been covering today :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: travel : disruption on anti-clockwise m25
text: a lorry has overturned on the anti-clockwise m25 , closing two lanes and causing serious disruption between j27 , for the m11 , and j26 , for the a121 ( waltham abbey ) .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: goldfinger murder : victim had 'turned his life around '
text: john 'goldfinger ' palmer , whose murder features on the bbc 's crimewatch programme tonight , had recently turned his life around according to his partner , christina ketley .
`` he had made mistakes in his life but he had paid for those mistakes , '' she said .
`` i was incredibly proud of the way he had readjusted to a very , very normal life . ''
detectives found a hole in the fence surrounding mr palmer 's sprawling grounds which they believe the gunman used to watch his movements .
author: Laura Devlin
BBC News

documents.title: woman , 70 , punched in unprovoked attack
text: a 70-year-old woman has been hurt following an unprovoked attack near chelmsford , police say .
the victim was walking her dog in the street in little waltham last week when a man punched her in the head .
when she asked why he 'd assaulted her , the suspect then hit her twice more .
he 's described as being about 30 to 40 years old , white , about 5ft 9in tall with a wispy beard .

documents.title: police must improve protection for vulnerable crime victims
text: essex police must improve its performance in protecting vulnerable individuals including missing young people , domestic abuse and child sex victims , the force 's police and crime commissioner says .

in his latest quarterly report into the conduct and discipline matters for the period october to december 2015 , nick alston said there were too many cases `` where essex police had n't got it right '' .
`` the force is carrying out extensive work to improve performance , learning and to drive change in these areas .
the chief constable is also deeply committed to this work , '' he said .
author: Patrick Byrne
BBC News

documents.title: former detective : 'goldfinger ' police have tough task ahead
text: a former scotland yard detective says officers have a tough task ahead solving the murder of notorious criminal john palmer , who is believed to have been killed in a professional hit .
the case is being featured on the bbc 's crimewatch tonight , and a reconstruction ( been filmed .
roy ramm , a former commander of special operations at new scotland yard , says it will be difficult to solve , but the appeal could lead to new information .

`` there 's no love lost between lots of these criminal gangs , and if there 's some revenge to be had or a debt to be paid it could be that someone decides to quietly blow a whistle for essex police tonight . ''
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live

documents.title: colchester 's szmodics out for season
text: colchester united midfielder sammie szmodics has been ruled out for the rest of the season because he requires ankle surgery .
the 20-year-old has made 51 appearances for the u 's since coming through their youth ranks but has been restricted by injury this season .
he had a three-game loan at braintree earlier this term , but has only played twice since his return in november .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: weather : cloudy start , brightening up later
text: it will be a rather cloudy start with perhaps with the odd spot of rain in the west .
it will brighten up through the day however , with sunny spells developing .
you can find more details on the bbc weather website or see my full forecast below
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: john palmer described as 'quite an arrogant man '
text: a former commander of special operations at new scotland yard , who testified against john palmer during a trial in 2001 , described him as `` quite an arrogant man '' .
pictured above with his son james , mr palmer , 65 , died last june after being shot dead in the back garden of his home .

`` he probably felt he was quite safe out in south weald while he was at home , but clearly he was n't , '' said roy ramm , who added the shooting would be hard to crack due to fear of `` grassing up '' .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : m25 lanes closed near m11 after lorry overturned
text: there are long delays on the anticlockwise m25 between junction 27 for the m11 and junction 26 for waltham abbey because of an overturned lorry and a spillage of sand .
two lanes are closed .
you can check the latest situation here .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: headlines : john 'goldfinger ' palmer 'killed by professional gunman ' man bailed over m11 crash
text: here are the stories we 're looking at this morning :
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

documents.title: goldfinger murder : partner and son speak about their memories
text: interviews with john `` goldfinger '' palmer 's partner and son will feature in tonight 's bbc crimewatch appeal about his murder .
christina ketley says she was `` incredibly proud '' of the way mr palmer had `` readjusted to a very very normal life '' before his death .
his son james said his father was `` never serious about anything '' , and the pair used to spend `` quality time '' together .

documents.title: goldfinger murder : was he a police informant ?
text: there are rumours jon `` goldfinger '' palmer was a police informant at the time of his death , but essex police refused to comment ahead of an appeal on bbc crimewatch this evening .
officers said the crime scene had been `` professionally '' stripped of evidence .
no shots were heard in the house and his body laid undiscovered until it was found by his son 's girlfriend an hour later .
his son james ketley ( who was in the house at the time , told bbc crimewatch : `` there was never a day that went past that i spent with him where he was n't laughing or joking around .
`` he was never serious about anything .
the time i did spend with him was quality time . ''
author: Laura Devlin
BBC News

documents.title: goldfinger murder : possible suspect
text: a man was spotted near the house in south weald at 17:50 on 24 june - 20 minutes after mr palmer was found dead .
detectives are also looking to trace two or three men seen digging a hole in the woodland surrounding his home at about 11:50 on 23 june .
crimewatch is on bbc one tonight at 21:00 .
author: Laura Devlin
BBC News

documents.title: goldfinger murder : two significant lines of inquiry , police say
text: police will appeal for information on the murder of john 'goldfinger ' palmer on crimewatch this evening .

det ch insp stephen jennings from essex police said the force was following two `` very significant main lines of inquiry at the moment '' , including that mr palmer was due to stand trial in mainland spain relating to accusations of real estate fraud .

`` the second is a combination of factors throughout 2015 which included a number of significant crimes in the uk , significant law enforcement intervention into organised crime in the uk and significant arrests of people in organised crime groups . ''
author: Laura Devlin
BBC News

documents.title: who was john 'goldfinger ' palmer ?
text: who was john 'goldfinger ' palmer ?
author: BBC Essex

documents.title: goldfinger murder : killer ambushed him while he worked in garden
text: police say convicted fraudster john palmer , who was shot dead at his home near brentwood last june , .
managed to walk a short distance towards his house before collapsing .
officers found cctv footage of him using a vehicle to transfer rubbish to another area in the garden - not covered by cameras - where the killer ambushed him .
it was initially thought palmer had suffered a cardiac arrest after recent surgery - it took a week for a post-mortem examination to reveal he had been shot .
author: Laura Devlin
BBC News

documents.title: goldfinger shooting likely to be a 'professional hit ' , police say
text: the shooting of a notorious criminal in his garden `` bears all the hallmarks of a professional hit '' , police have said .
john `` goldfinger '' palmer , 65 , who allegedly amassed a huge fortune in a time-share scam , was shot six times in the chest at his home in south weald in june .
speaking ahead of a bbc crimewatch appeal , officers said they believe his killer climbed over a fence and shot palmer in an area not covered by cctv .
author: Laura Devlin
BBC News

documents.title: welcome to essex live
text: good morning - hope you 're well this morning .
for the first few hours , we 're going to bring you all the latest developments on the john `` goldfinger '' palmer case , which police say was a `` professional hit '' .
feel free to get in touch at any time , you can email , tweet , or visit our facebook page .
author: Charlie Jones
BBC Local Live
